Warren Buffett did not make any contribu: s 2020 presidential campaign, as confirmed by records from the Federal Election Commission and the nonprofit Center for Responsive Politics.
The claim that Warren Buffett donated: 58 million to Biden's campaign is unsubstantiated and it is unclear where this figure originated.
The Keystone XL pipeline was canceled by: but it was not due to any alleged donation from Warren Buffett. Biden cited economic and climate imperatives as the reasons for revoking the pipeline's construction permit.
The image that circulated on Facebook: claiming that Biden canceled the Keystone pipeline to repay a favor to Warren Buffett, misspelled Buffett's name and misrepresented the situation. It falsely portrayed the cancellation as a money issue rather than an environmental and economic decision.
